revised_title: Vibrations of Bars with Variable Section: Analyzing Lateral Vibrations and Nodal Ratios
tldr: This article investigates the lateral vibrations of bars with variable sections, focusing on the positions of fundamental nodes and nodal ratios. The author analyzes various shapes, including double conical rods and double paraboloids, and provides formulas for calculating nodal ratios and periods of vibrations. The study contributes to a better understanding of the behavior of vibrating rods and has implications for engineering applications.
